languages.text: Даже обширные агрокомплексы Януса не способны объять весь простор плодородной планеты. Им помогут гигантские гусеничные мега-комбайны. Они отправятся в многомесячные странствия по планете, управляемые приписанными к ним кланами серфов, рождающихся, живущих и умирающих в недрах великих машин. Эти гиганты будут жать урожай зубастыми пастями, взламывать почву плугами из пластали, выпивать воду жадными гидро-помпами из болотистых низин и извергать ее на засушливые холмы.

traits.locale_text: Сконструировать огромные мега-харвестеры, на которых будут жить и заготавливать провиант целые кланы сервов.

languages.text: Not even the sprawling agri-complexes of Janus can cover the whole of the planet's fertile expanse. Gargantuan tracked mega-harvesters will come to their aid. They will wander the planet for months, each one operated by its assigned clan of serfs who are born, live, and die in the bowels of these great machines. These giants will reap harvests with their toothed jaws, break open the soil with their plasteel ploughs, and drink the swampy lowlands dry with their thirsty hydropumps, spewing the water forth down upon the arid hills.
languages.original_text: Даже обширные агрокомплексы Януса не способны объять весь простор плодородной планеты. Им помогут гигантские гусеничные мега-комбайны. Они отправятся в многомесячные странствия по планете, управляемые приписанными к ним кланами серфов, рождающихся, живущих и умирающих в недрах великих машин. Эти гиганты будут жать урожай зубастыми пастями, взламывать почву плугами из пластали, выпивать воду жадными гидро-помпами из болотистых низин и извергать ее на засушливые холмы.

traits.locale_text: Not even the sprawling agri-complexes of Janus can cover the whole of the planet's fertile expanse. Gargantuan tracked mega-harvesters will come to their aid. They will wander the planet for months, each one operated by its assigned clan of serfs who are born, live, and die in the bowels of these great machines. These giants will reap harvests with their toothed jaws, break open the soil with their plasteel ploughs, drink the swampy lowlands dry with their thirsty hydropumps, and bring the water down upon the arid hills.

Not even the sprawling agri-complexes of Janus can cover the whole of the planet's fertile expanse. Gargantuan tracked mega-harvesters will come to their aid. They will wander the planet for months, each one operated by its assigned clan of serfs who are born, live, and die in the bowels of these great machines. These giants will reap harvests with their toothed jaws, break open the soil with their plasteel ploughs, drink the swampy lowlands dry with their thirsty hydropumps, and bring the water down upon the arid hills.

They will wander the planet for months, each one operated by its assigned clan of serfs who are born, live, and die in the bowels of these great machines. These giants will reap harvests with their toothed jaws, break open the soil with their plasteel ploughs, and drink the swampy lowlands dry with their thirsty hydropumps, spewing the water forth down upon the arid hills.

Not even the sprawling agri-complexes of Janus can cover the whole of the planet's fertile expanse. Gargantuan tracked mega-harvesters will come to their aid. They will wander the planet for months, each one operated by its assigned clan of serfs who are born, live, and die in the bowels of these great machines. These giants will reap harvests with their toothed jaws, break open the soil with their plasteel ploughs, and drink the swampy lowlands dry with their thirsty hydropumps, spewing the water forth down upon the arid hills.

Not even the sprawling agri-complexes of Janus can cover the whole of the planet's fertile expanse. Gargantuan tracked mega-harvesters will come to their aid. They will wander the planet for months, each one operated by its assigned clan of serfs who are born, live, and die in the bowels of these great machines. These giants will reap harvests with their toothed jaws, break open the soil with their plasteel ploughs, and drink the swampy lowlands dry with their thirsty hydropumps, spewing the water forth down upon the arid hills.

languages.text: Ni siquiera los inmensos complejos agrícolas de Janus pueden cubrir la totalidad del terreno fértil del planeta. Las colosales megacosechadoras con orugas acudirán en su ayuda. Recorrerán el planeta durante meses bajo la tutela de clanes asignados a cada una que nacen, viven y mueren sin llegar a salir de las entrañas de estas imponentes máquinas. Estos gigantes segarán cosechas con sus fauces, romperán la tierra con arados de plastiacero y secarán los cenagales con sus bombas hidráulicas, usando sus aguas para regar las colinas áridas.
languages.original_text: Not even the sprawling agri-complexes of Janus can cover the whole of the planet's fertile expanse. Gargantuan tracked mega-harvesters will come to their aid. They will wander the planet for months, each one operated by its assigned clan of serfs who are born, live, and die in the bowels of these great machines. These giants will reap harvests with their toothed jaws, break open the soil with their plasteel ploughs, and drink the swampy lowlands dry with their thirsty hydropumps, spewing the water forth down upon the arid hills.

traits.locale_text: Ni siquiera los inmensos complejos agrícolas de Janus pueden cubrir la totalidad del terreno fértil del planeta. Las colosales megacosechadoras con orugas acudirán en su ayuda. Recorrerán el planeta durante meses bajo la tutela de clanes asignados a cada una que nacen, viven y mueren sin llegar a salir de las entrañas de estas imponentes máquinas. Estos gigantes segarán cosechas con sus fauces, romperán la tierra con arados de plastiacero y secarán los cenagales con sus bombas hidráulicas, usando sus aguas para regar las colinas áridas.

languages.text: Même les agri-complexes tentaculaires de Janus ne peuvent couvrir la totalité des terres fertiles de la planète. C'est là que les méga-moissonneuses à chenilles entrent en jeu. Elles arpenteront la planète des mois durant, exploitées par tout un clan de serfs qui naîtront, vivront et mourront dans les entrailles des machines titanesques. Ces géants moissonneront avec leurs mâchoires, laboureront avec leurs socs de plastacier et assécheront les plaines marécageuses avec leurs insatiables pompes, avant de recracher l'eau sur les collines arides.
languages.original_text: Not even the sprawling agri-complexes of Janus can cover the whole of the planet's fertile expanse. Gargantuan tracked mega-harvesters will come to their aid. They will wander the planet for months, each one operated by its assigned clan of serfs who are born, live, and die in the bowels of these great machines. These giants will reap harvests with their toothed jaws, break open the soil with their plasteel ploughs, and drink the swampy lowlands dry with their thirsty hydropumps, spewing the water forth down upon the arid hills.

traits.locale_text: Même les agri-complexes tentaculaires de Janus ne peuvent couvrir la totalité des terres fertiles de la planète. C'est là que les méga-moissonneuses à chenilles entrent en jeu. Elles arpenteront la planète des mois durant, exploitées par tout un clan de serfs qui naîtront, vivront et mourront dans les entrailles des machines titanesques. Ces géants moissonneront avec leurs mâchoires, laboureront avec leurs socs de plastacier et assécheront les plaines marécageuses avec leurs insatiables pompes, avant de recracher l'eau sur les collines arides.

languages.text: 即便加努斯建立了无数综合农业中心，也无法覆盖整颗行星广袤的沃土。人们准备使用巨大的履带式收割机进行劳作。无数农奴氏族在这只庞然大物的肚子中出生、劳作、死亡，操作着这台巨型机器无边的原野上游荡数月，用钢铁巨口收割庄稼，用塑钢挖机翻开土壤，用饥渴的水泵吸净低洼的沼泽，再喷洒到干旱的山丘。
languages.original_text: Not even the sprawling agri-complexes of Janus can cover the whole of the planet's fertile expanse. Gargantuan tracked mega-harvesters will come to their aid. They will wander the planet for months, each one operated by its assigned clan of serfs who are born, live, and die in the bowels of these great machines. These giants will reap harvests with their toothed jaws, break open the soil with their plasteel ploughs, and drink the swampy lowlands dry with their thirsty hydropumps, spewing the water forth down upon the arid hills.

traits.locale_text: 即便加努斯建立了无数综合农业中心，也无法覆盖整颗行星广袤的沃土。人们准备使用巨大的履带式收割机进行劳作。无数农奴氏族在这只庞然大物的肚子中出生、劳作、死亡，操作着这台巨型机器无边的原野上游荡数月，用钢铁巨口收割庄稼，用塑钢挖机翻开土壤，用饥渴的水泵吸净低洼的沼泽，再喷洒到干旱的山丘。

languages.text: ヤヌスの広大な農業施設でさえ、この惑星の肥沃な土地全体をカバーすることはできない。巨大な追跡型メガハーベスターが彼らを助ける。この機械は、巨大な機械に囲まれた場所で生まれ、生き、死んでいく農奴の一族によって操作される。これらの巨人たちは、歯のついた顎で収穫物を刈り取り、プラスチールの鋤で土を砕き、渇いた水力ポンプで湿地帯の低地を飲み干し、乾燥した丘の上に水を吐き出すのだ。
languages.original_text: Not even the sprawling agri-complexes of Janus can cover the whole of the planet's fertile expanse. Gargantuan tracked mega-harvesters will come to their aid. They will wander the planet for months, each one operated by its assigned clan of serfs who are born, live, and die in the bowels of these great machines. These giants will reap harvests with their toothed jaws, break open the soil with their plasteel ploughs, and drink the swampy lowlands dry with their thirsty hydropumps, spewing the water forth down upon the arid hills.

traits.locale_text: ヤヌスの広大な農業施設でさえ、この惑星の肥沃な土地全体をカバーすることはできない。巨大な追跡型メガハーベスターが彼らを助ける。この機械は、巨大な機械に囲まれた場所で生まれ、生き、死んでいく農奴の一族によって操作される。これらの巨人たちは、歯のついた顎で収穫物を刈り取り、プラスチールの鋤で土を砕き、渇いた水力ポンプで湿地帯の低地を飲み干し、乾燥した丘の上に水を吐き出すのだ。

languages.text: Nicht einmal die weitreichenden Agri-Komplexe von Janus können die gesamte fruchtbare Weite des Planeten bedecken. Gigantische Mega-Erntemaschinen mit Ketten sollen helfen. Sie wandern monatelang über den Planeten, jede von einem zugewiesenen Clan von Sklaven bedient, die in den Eingeweiden dieser Kolosse geboren werden, leben und sterben. Die Maschinen reißen die Ernte mit ihren bezahnten Kiefern aus dem Boden, brechen die Erde mit ihren Pflügen aus Plaststahl auf und trinken die sumpfigen Tiefebenen mit ihren durstigen Hydropumpen trocken, um das Wasser auf die ariden Hügel zu spucken.
languages.original_text: Not even the sprawling agri-complexes of Janus can cover the whole of the planet's fertile expanse. Gargantuan tracked mega-harvesters will come to their aid. They will wander the planet for months, each one operated by its assigned clan of serfs who are born, live, and die in the bowels of these great machines. These giants will reap harvests with their toothed jaws, break open the soil with their plasteel ploughs, and drink the swampy lowlands dry with their thirsty hydropumps, spewing the water forth down upon the arid hills.

traits.locale_text: Nicht einmal die weitreichenden Agri-Komplexe von Janus können die gesamte fruchtbare Weite des Planeten bedecken. Gigantische Mega-Erntemaschinen mit Ketten sollen helfen. Sie wandern monatelang über den Planeten, jede von einem zugewiesenen Clan von Sklaven bedient, die in den Eingeweiden dieser Kolosse geboren werden, leben und sterben. Die Maschinen reißen die Ernte mit ihren bezahnten Kiefern aus dem Boden, brechen die Erde mit ihren Pflügen aus Plaststahl auf und trinken die sumpfigen Tiefebenen mit ihren durstigen Hydropumpen trocken, um das Wasser auf die ariden Hügel zu spucken.
